text: The Third Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet was the third Cabinet of Singapore formed by Prime Minister Lee Kuan Yew in 1968, after the 1968 Singaporean general election. The cabinet lasted until 1972, with one shuffle in 1970. ==Ministers== {| class="wikitable" |- !Portfolio !Minister !Political party !Term start !Term end |- |Prime Minister |Lee Kuan Yew | |16 April 1968 |15 September 1972 |- |Minister of Science and Technology |Toh Chin Chye | |16 April 1968 |15 September 1972 |- | rowspan="2" |Minister for Finance |Goh Keng Swee | |16 April 1968 |10 August 1970 |- |Hon Sui Sen | |11 August 1970 |15 September 1972 |- |Minister of Foreign Affairs |S.
